recipe.title: Bagel Chips with Smoked Salmon, Capers, and Lemon
ingredients: 1 tbsp plus 1 1/2 tsp minced lemon zest
4 oz smoked salmon, cut into a dozen 2-inch pieces
1 tbsp plus 1 1/2 tsp capers or 12 caper berries
Handful of arugula (or other greens such as fennel fronds), chopped
instructions: Mix cream cheese, lemon juice and zest. Season with salt and pepper. Dollop a small spoonful of cream cheese mixture on each bagel chip. Gently roll salmon pieces into loose cylinders and lightly pinch together at the bottom to create a rose shape. Place salmon pieces, pinched side down, on top of chips; sprinkle with capers. Arrange chips on a platter and garnish with greens.
